meanings.sent1: The old, crumbling house was uninhabitable due to its dangerous condition.
meanings.sent2: The desert is uninhabitable because of the extreme heat and lack of water.
meanings.sent3: The idea of living in an uninhabitable igloo made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: After the hurricane, the town looked uninhabitable, like a ghost town.
meanings.sent5: The toxic waste made the area completely uninhabitable for any living creature.
